sugar_info.norm: Maximum amount of free sugars is about 10% of your daily calorie intake, a total of 90g of sugar (free sugars and natural sugars)
sugar_info.adult_men: Men can consume a maximum of 60g of sugar
sugar_info.adult_women: Women can consume a maximum of 50g of sugar
sugar_info.children: In general: children between 2-18, can consume 25g of sugar

caffeine_info.adult_men: Adults can consume 5,7mg/kg/day of caffeine, so this means they can consume a maximum of 320mg of caffeine per day
caffeine_info.adult_women: Women (in their fertile period) can consume 200mg - 300mg of caffeine per day
caffeine_info.preg_women: Pregnant women only a maximum of 100mg of caffeine per day (recommended)
caffeine_info.children: Children (with a weight of 30kg) can consume 2,5mg/kg/day of caffeine per day, so this means they can consume a maximum of 75mg of caffeine per day

extra_info: for adults you can only drink 2 cans of coca cola of 330ml, because otherwise you will go above the average. For children it is less than 2 cans
